title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices         Immigration & Naturalization Staff Source: U.S. Customs & Border Protection  All official inquiries, inquiries and comments should be directed to: Write to: National Park Service Attn: Superintendent Statue of Liberty National Monument Liberty Island New York, New York 10004 E-mail the park. General Information Line: 212 363-3200 Information about ferry tickets, schedules, cancellations and other trip planning items related to traveling to and from the island, please visit www.statuecruises.com. Note: Statue Cruises is the only authorized vendor for ferry tickets to the Statue of Liberty National Monument and Ellis Island.
